Dear Madam,

 

Thanks for waiting . 

 

Please find below our warehouse storage charges for you reference and advise your feedback to us-  

 

We shall revert with the temperature storage charge asap. 

 

 

Handling In (palletized)

AED 17 w/m (Min  AED 200) + 5% VAT

Handling Out (palletized)

AED 17 w/m (Min  AED 200) + 5% VAT

Storage Cost

AED 1.1 w/m per day + 5% VAT

 

*	The above rates are valid only for pallet dimensions– 120x80x100cm – 500kgs per pallet.  Any change in these details, the cost will differ .
*	Logistics Agreement needs to be signed between the consignee  and Globelink West Star.
*	The rates given is based on importing the shipment in the name of consginee and storing in Globelink warehouse.  If importing the shipment is to be done in Globelink West Star, we will have to do transfer of ownership.  There will be additional charges for this.  Let us know if required, so accordingly we can provide.
*	Customs inspection if any – Usd 55 per document + 5% VAT.  Offloading / loading at inspection site will be at actual + 5% VAT

 

OTHER TERMS AND CONDITIONS

*	Customs duty @ of 5% of CIF value (commercial cargo) if the importer is a local company
*	Rates are for general cargo.  Not applicable for dangerous/imco goods
*	Container washing/ Container Repair / MECRC Charges if applicable in order for the Dubai port to accept the empty container back to yard will be charged at actual and has to be paid from you end.
*	Line demurrage / Port storage if any, at actual
*	Single or multiple HS Code listed on the shipping documents, if does not match with custom’s system, additional charge of USD 12.25 per HS Code will be applicable.
*	We are not responsible for any claim of damage or shortage of cargo inside the sealed container.
*	Cargo needs to be insured from your end.
*	VAT Charges will be charged at Actuals.
*	Consignee needs to arrange the ministry / municipality/CID/Police approval if required.
*	Any charges besides the above mentioned, if any, will be charged at actual.
*	Logistic service agreement needs to be signed by both parties prior to the receipt of shipment. 
*	Warehouse space is subject to availability upon confirmation.
*	The warehousing will be allowed only for the commodities legally entitled for storage in our facility.
*	Value Added Service like piece counting, piece picking repacking, labeling, palletization etc….(if any), will be charged additional on case-to-case basis.
*	Additional charges shall be applicable to in case of any additional equipment require to handle the material apart from a 3 ton forklift 
*	Invoice and packing list should be provided for documentation purpose.
*	WMS portal access / inventory management portal access will be given on request and related charges will apply.

*	WMS portal access / inventory management portal access will be given on request and related charges will apply.
*	Warehouse timings is 0800 hrs to 1700 hrs (Monday to Friday), any job done after the normal working hours and government holidays overtime will apply at an additional cost.
*	Insurance coverage -Client is responsible to take adequate insurance coverage for the stock/cargo stored in our logistics center.
*	Standard Trading Conditions - The duties, responsibilities, and liabilities of the company are subject to the provisions of the Standard Trading Conditions available with the company on request.

 

Documents required for clearing:

 

1.	Original Commercial Invoice containing H.S. Code, Nett Weight, Gross Wt, Country of origin, stamp of shipper, unit price, Total price, number of pieces, currency type, payment terms with shipper has to be provided. 
2.	Original packing List containing Invoice number, Nett Weight, Quantity, stamp of shipper and Gross Weight as mentioned in bill of lading has to be provided. 
3.	Original certificate of origin issued by Chamber of Commerce is a must for duty exempted shipment. In case customs duty paid shipment then if the origin (i.e. made in ) of product is declared in invoice them certificate of origin is not required.
4.	Original bill of lading duly endorsed, if not surrendered or express Release. For, Ministry of Industry and Advanced Technology (MOIAT) duty exemption original bill of lading is a must.
5.	Dubai Customs Valid Import Code and Mirsal II Code has to be provided.
6.	In the absence of original Invoice, Certificate of Origin, Packing List a Deposit of Usd 291/- is applicable.

Dear Madam,

 

Thanks for waiting . 

 

Please find below our warehouse storage charges for you reference and advise your feedback to us-  

 

We shall revert with the temperature storage charge asap. 

 

 

Handling In (palletized)

AED 17 w/m (Min  AED 200) + 5% VAT

Handling Out (palletized)

AED 17 w/m (Min  AED 200) + 5% VAT

Storage Cost

AED 1.1 w/m per day + 5% VAT

 

*	The above rates are valid only for pallet dimensions– 120x80x100cm – 500kgs per pallet.  Any change in these details, the cost will differ .
*	Logistics Agreement needs to be signed between the consignee  and Globelink West Star.
*	The rates given is based on importing the shipment in the name of consginee and storing in Globelink warehouse.  If importing the shipment is to be done in Globelink West Star, we will have to do transfer of ownership.  There will be additional charges for this.  Let us know if required, so accordingly we can provide.
*	Customs inspection if any – Usd 55 per document + 5% VAT.  Offloading / loading at inspection site will be at actual + 5% VAT

 

OTHER TERMS AND CONDITIONS

*	Customs duty @ of 5% of CIF value (commercial cargo) if the importer is a local company

*	VAT Charges will be charged at Actuals.

*	Any charges besides the above mentioned, if any, will be charged at actual.
*	Logistic service agreement needs to be signed by both parties prior to the receipt of shipment. 
*	Warehouse space is subject to availability upon confirmation.
*	The warehousing will be allowed only for the commodities legally entitled for storage in our facility.

Documents required for clearing:

 

1.	Original Commercial Invoice containing H.S. Code, Nett Weight, Gross Wt, Country of origin, stamp of shipper, unit price, Total price, number of pieces, currency type, payment terms with shipper has to be provided. 
2.	Original packing List containing Invoice number, Nett Weight, Quantity, stamp of shipper and Gross Weight as mentioned in bill of lading has to be provided. 
3.	Original certificate of origin issued by Chamber of Commerce is a must for duty exempted shipment. In case customs duty paid shipment then if the origin (i.e. made in ) of product is declared in invoice them certificate of origin is not required.
4.	Original bill of lading duly endorsed, if not surrendered or express Release. For, Ministry of Industry and Advanced Technology (MOIAT) duty exemption original bill of lading is a must.
5.	Dubai Customs Valid Import Code and Mirsal II Code has to be provided.
6.	In the absence of original Invoice, Certificate of Origin, Packing List a Deposit of Usd 291/- is applicable.
